conclusion: Analyze given information and graphs to determine wave direction and speed
Figure 1 shows a complete wave cycle from x = 0 to x = 4 m
Figure 2 shows a complete cycle from t = 0 to t = 4 s
At t = 2 s, particle at x = 2 m is at equilibrium position and moving upward in Figure 2
Wave at x = 2 m is at equilibrium position and moving upward in Figure 1
Wave moving to the right is consistent with upward movement at x = 2 m
Wave is propagating in the positive x-direction
Wave speed v is given by v = λ/T
Wave speed v = 4 m / 4 s = 1 m/s
Direction of wave propagation is along positive x-axis and wave speed is 1 m/s
